name: slmdmcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2))

stmt.origin: syl3an1(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2), wcel(c5, csrg))
stmt.pretty: syl3an1(c0 ∈ SLMod, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c1[c4]c3)∈ c2, c5 ∈ SRing)

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c5, csrg))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c5, csrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ SLMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c4]c3)∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ SLMod → c5 ∈ SRing)
⊣ ((c5 ∈ SRing ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c4]c3)∈ c2)

⊣ (c0 ∈ SLMod → c5 ∈ SRing)
⊣ ((c5 ∈ SRing ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c4]c3)∈ c2)

-| wceq(c5, cfv(csca, c0))
